longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Kenya can obtain a visa
on arrival
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Warning:
- A yellow fever vaccination certificate may be required for
  those leaving Sierra Leone.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
